net.sf.wubiq.print.jobs

Interface IRemotePrintJob

  • All Superinterfaces:
    javax.print.DocPrintJob
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    RemotePrintJob

    public interface IRemotePrintJob
extends javax.print.DocPrintJob
    Represents the contract of a remote print job
    Author:
    Federico Alcantara

      • getSupportsOnlyPageable

        java.lang.Boolean getSupportsOnlyPageable()
        For compatibility for printers supporting only serialized pageable. Or in the event that data was pageable and persisted.
        Returns:
        True if the printer ONLY uses pageables.
